49.name: Sons of Svanir's Bane
49.description: The only good ice dragon cultist is a dead ice dragon cultist.
49.requirement: Kill  members of the Sons of Svanir.

104.name: Mist Explorer
104.description: You've explored the battlefields between worlds.
104.requirement: Explore all areas in the battlegrounds of the Mists.

199.name: Fawcett's Bounty
199.description: Discover the location of Captain Fawcett's pirate treasure.

464.name: Ascalonian Ambient Killer
464.description: A little too innocent, if you ask me.
464.requirement: Kill ambient creatures in the following Ascalonian maps: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, and Fireheart Rise.

472.name: Costume Brawl Champion
472.description: Emerge as a champion from a costume brawl.

496.name: Condition Remover
496.requirement: Remove bleeding, blinding, burning, chill, confusion, crippling, fear, immobilization, poison, vulnerability, or weakness from yourself or your allies.

698.name: Voyage to the Bazaar
698.requirement: Arrive at the Bazaar of the Four Winds by taking a ship from Sanctum Harbor.

791.name: Lion's Arch Ambassador
791.requirement: Represent Lion's Arch in the Crown Pavilion.

829.name: Watchwork Nightmare Wrecker
829.requirement: Defeat a Champion Twisted Nightmare during one of Scarlet's portal invasions in Gendarran Fields.

861.name: Tough Customer, World 1
861.requirement: Visit every shop in World 1 in Tribulation Mode.

bits.text: The mountain has a back door.

873.name: Bachelor of Secrets, World 2
873.requirement: Find every hidden room (excluding furniture shops) in World 2, Zone 2.

bits.text: On a tall, green mountain top.

924.name: Greasing the Gears
924.description: The squeaky door gets the ooze.
924.requirement: Use the ooze to open the gate.

1102.name: The Nightmare Unveiled (Historical)
1102.requirement: Travel to Kessex Hills and complete the story instance The Nightmare Unveiled to confront the new toxic threat.

1143.name: Fractal Fortnight: Volcanic
1143.description: It might be time to get a new pair of shoes.
1143.requirement: You've completed the Volcanic fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1195.name: Aetherblade Retreat Stabilizer
1195.requirement: You've completed the Aetherblade fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1313.name: Marionette Dodger
1313.requirement: Triumph in the fourth assault on the Twisted Marionette's power regulators without being downed or hit by its sword attack.

1385.name: All Bets Are Off
1385.description: Story Instance: Escape from Lion's Arch
1385.requirement: Find all 7 of Tigg's lost racing moas and rally them to escape Lion's Arch.

1411.name: Hold the Line
1411.requirement: Participate in Rally Point Defense events in Lion's Arch.

1528.name: Lost and Found
1528.requirement: Find heirlooms amid the wreckage of the city.

1634.name: Coin Collector: Prospect Valley
1634.requirement: Find all of the lost coins hidden in Prospect Valley.

1667.name: Time Waits for No One
1667.requirement: Complete the Concordia instance in under 10 minutes.

1756.name: World Contributor Round 3
1756.requirement: Participate in round three of the tournament. Complete any  WvW event this week.

1769.name: A Stomping Good Time
1769.requirement: Use 20 Scarecrow or Mad King stomps against players in PvP or WvW.

1894.name: Daily Skipping Stones Jumping Puzzle
1894.requirement: Complete the Skipping Stones jumping puzzle in Southsun Cove.

1912.name: Daily Spekks's Lab Jumping Puzzle
1912.requirement: Complete the Spekks's Laboratory jumping puzzle in Caledon Forest.

1968.name: Daily Shiverpeaks Lumberer
1968.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1968.requirement: Gather raw materials by harvesting trees in the following Shiverpeak Mountains maps: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, and Frostgorge Sound.

2061.name: Rock Dodger
2061.requirement: Defeat the cave enemy while avoiding all rocks, thrown or otherwise.

2110.name: Daily Guardian or Thief Winner
2110.requirement: Win  PvP match as a guardian or thief.

2121.name: Daydreamer's Weapon Collection
2121.requirement: Unlock all  Daydreamer's weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2145.name: Verdant Brink Insight: Thistlevine Ravine
2145.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2150.name: Verdant Brink Insight: Heartless Pass
2150.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2209.name: Death to the Undying
2209.requirement: Defeat the Skeletal Lich in Mad King's Labyrinth.

2214.name: "Pride of Lion's Arch" Strongbox
2214.requirement: Search in the Prismatic Postpile area for the strongbox from the "Pride of Lion's Arch."

bits.text: Can be found in Crystallized Supply Caches in the Rata Novus lane.
Can be found in Crystallized Supply Caches in the SCAR lane.
Can be found in Crystallized Supply Caches in the Nuhoch lane.
Can be found in Crystallized Supply Caches in the ogre lane.
Earn silver or better in this adventure.
Earn silver or better in this adventure.
Earn silver or better in this adventure.
Earn silver or better in this adventure.
Earn silver or better in this adventure.

2285.name: Priory's History
2285.requirement: Unlock all  Priory Historical weapon and armor skins.
2285.locked_text: Purchase a Priory Equipment Guide from Priory weapon and armor merchants at the Durmand Priory.

2312.name: Pumpkin Carving
2312.description: Made in the Mad King's own image.
2312.requirement: Find pumpkins all around Tyria and carve them.

2326.name: "Sword of Smodur" Strongbox
2326.requirement: Search in the Chak Stronghold area for the strongbox from the "Sword of Smodur."

2360.name: Crusader's Pack
2360.requirement: Collect all  items to create your Crusader's Pack.
2360.locked_text: On first completion of the story step "Prisoners of the Dragon," choose one of the three order-themed backpacks.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Complete the story step "Heart of Thorns."

2368.name: Ad Infinitum III: Unbound
2368.description: Unlock all 11 fractal tier 3 components to work towards building the legendary fractal backpack.
2368.locked_text: Complete Ad Infinitum II, then talk to Kelvei in the Fractals of the Mists.

2478.name: Frostfang I: The Experimental Axe
2478.description: The power of Jormag and the other Elder Dragons seeped into the lands of Tyria during the long epochs while they slept. Upwellings of this power may be found throughout the land, for those who know where to look and how to capture it. Let finding this power be the first part of your journey to craft the legendary precursor Tooth of Frostfang.
2478.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Purchase the recipe for this jar from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Use a Destroyer Jar after defeating the Megadestroyer in Mount Maelstrom to fill it with essence.
Distill your captured Essence of Primordus in the caves below the Dominion Killing Zone in Kessex Hills.
Purchase the recipe for this jar from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Use a Corrupted Jar after defeating the Claw of Jormag in Frostgorge Sound to fill it with essence.
Distill your captured Essence of Jormag near the frost portal in the Drakkar Spurs region of Frostgorge Sound.
Purchase the recipe for this jar from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Use an Evergreen Jar after defeating the Vinewrath in Silverwastes to fill it with essence.
Distill your captured Essence of Mordremoth at the Corpse Grove in Verdant Brink.
Purchase the recipe for this jar from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Use a Crystal Jar after defeating the Shatterer in Blazeridge Steppes to fill it with essence.
Distill your captured Essence of Kralkatorrik in the branded waterfall above Lake Desolann in the Iron Marches.
Purchase the recipe for this jar from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Use a Vile Jar after defeating Tequatl the Sunless in Sparkfly Fen to fill it with essence.
Distill your captured Essence of Zhaitan at the Gates of Arah in Cursed Shore.

2525.name: Predatory Prey
2525.requirement: Defeat all enemies in the teamwork trial.

2564.name: Incinerator I: The Experimental Dagger
2564.description: From the heart of the furnace, the elements dance and caper at your command! Many rare and unusual elements are needed for your journey, and you must capture and comprehend them all in order to take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor Spark.
2564.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Use the Repurposed Rock Grinder at Dostoev Sky Peak in Dredgehaunt Cliffs to grind beryl orbs into dust.
Purchase the recipe for this from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Purchase the recipe for this from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Purchase the recipe for this from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Purchase the recipe for this from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Purchase the recipe for this from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Purchase the recipe for this from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Gather a sample of the materials the Dredge used to construct their buildings from the De Molish Post armory in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Gather a sample of the original building materials being used to build Sector Zuhl in Timberline Falls from the chest deep within the cave.
Gather a sample of the materials the Dwarves used to construct their vats in King Jalis' Refuge in Snowden Drifts.
Gather a sample of the materials used in the construction of the Thaumanova Reactor from the Thaumanova Reactor Fractal chest.
Gather a sample of the metal from the Pig Iron Mine jumping puzzle chest.
Gather a sample of the materials used by the ancient Orrians from the alter in the Vizier's Tower in Straits of Devastation.
Gather a sample of the materials the Molten Alliance used in constructing their base from the Molten Boss Fractal chest.
Gather a sample of the materials being used by the Aetherblades from the Frizz's Laboratory chest in the Aetherblade Fractal.

2648.name: Spectral Anomaly
2648.requirement: Avoid the Spectral Darkness, and defeat Gorseval.

2769.name: Toy Quality Control
2769.description: This can be described as one of those "fight fire with marshmallows" situations.
2769.requirement: Finish  round of Toypocalypse during Wintersday.

2770.name: Donation Defender
2770.requirement: Successfully escort  Ho-Ho-Tron's dolyak to the gate in Divinity's Reach.

2807.name: Shattering Evasion
2807.requirement: Defeat the Shatterer without ever being imprisoned in a crystal.

2865.name: Master of Decor, World 1
2865.description: Only the finest from the finest.
2865.requirement: Find all the furniture shops in World 1. Completing this achievement along with the one for World 2 will unlock a vendor tab on Moto's assistants.

bits.text: Just when you thought it was over!

2896.name: Daily Tier 1 Urban Battleground
2896.requirement: Complete Urban Battleground at fractal scale 1 or higher.

2912.name: Daily Heart of Maguuma Forager
2912.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
2912.requirement: Gather raw materials by foraging plants in the following Heart of Maguuma maps: Verdant Brink, Auric Basin, Tangled Depths, and Dragon's Stand.

2936.name: Daily Adventure: Tendril Torchers
2936.requirement: Open the bronze daily reward chest from this adventure!

2960.name: Daily Adventure: The Ley-Line Run
2960.requirement: Open the bronze daily reward chest from this adventure!

2988.name: Daily Adventure: Scrap Rifle Field Test
2988.requirement: Open the bronze daily reward chest from this adventure!

3107.name: Old Foes, Old Ghosts
3107.description: Journal: Old Foes, Old Ghosts Completed

3122.name: Dragon Duty
3122.requirement: Complete the Dragon Vigil story instance without being defeated.

3221.name: Playing Chicken
3221.requirement: Push a chicken to its limits.

3278.name: Dragon's Gaze
3278.requirement: Interrupt  skill in the Dragon Ball arena.

3301.name: Sabotage Fort Evennia
3301.requirement: Infiltrate and sabotage operations in Fort Evennia.

3358.name: Lake Doric Insight: Lakeside Bazaar
3358.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Lake Doric.

3405.name: Burnin' Down the House
3405.description: "There has got to be a way!"

3423.name: Desecration Prevention
3423.requirement: Slay a champion molten desecrator near Titan's Throat.

3536.name: Storyteller: Lyssa
3536.requirement: Find all the pages of the Parable of Lyssa.

bits.text: Hidden among the garden that is secret.
Take no portals to the place adorned by blossoms.
High above Lyssa, on the wing with no arches.
When portals lead you to the edge, things can be a bit chaotic.
Through the portals and over the edge, to see the sights of the tower.
Under the sunken bridge, at the Bloated Beach.
Sunken in a small cave, at the northern end of the Choking Depths.

3547.name: Draconis Mons Master
3547.requirement: Collect all  items to prove your mastery over Draconis Mons.
3547.locked_text: Acquire a Sentient Seed by combining the four sentient creations from Season 3. Misplaced items can be obtained from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Complete the "A Henge Away from Home" achievement.
Help the scouting party in Draconis Mons.
Help the prisoners in Draconis Mons.
Infiltrate the inquest in Draconis Mons.
Assist the ancient golems in Draconis Mons.
Complete the Searing Ascent in Draconis Mons.
Defeat the devourer champion in Draconis Mons.
Found in Zinn's stashes in Draconis Mons.
Obtained after defeating the legendary destroyer Ignis in Draconis Mons.
Obtained after defeating the legendary destroyer Aestus in Draconis Mons.
Obtained after defeating the bloodstone-charged lava wurm in Draconis Mons.
Obtained after defeating the greater spirit of nature in Draconis Mons.
Gathered from primordial orchids in Draconis Mons.

3556.name: Domain of Vabbi Bounty Tour
3556.requirement: Complete a bounty from each bounty board location in the Domain of Vabbi.

3596.name: Dwarven Remnants
3596.requirement: Find the forgotten dwarven chests located in the Desert Highlands.

3617.name: Vabbian Griffon Expert: Gold
3617.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3621.name: Silence of a Thousand Years
3621.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the spellbreaker's dagger, Silence of a Thousand Years.
3621.locked_text: Begin training the warrior's spellbreaker elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the warrior's spellbreaker elite specialization.
Drops from Awakened in Crystal Desert.
Purchased from Follower Xunn near Augury Rock in the Elon Riverlands.
As a warrior, use a Mystic Coin in the wishing well in the Garden of Seborhin in the Domain of Vabbi.
Complete the bounty for the Awakened occultist in Diviner's Reach in the Desert Highlands.
Purchased from Keeper Pamir at Torment's Watch in the Desolation.
Complete a race event as a warrior in any Crystal Desert map.
Found when identifying gear, or purchased from the Black Lion Trading Post.
Get Second Spear Nayrim to shelter in the Salt Flats of the Desert Highlands.
Explore the Hanging Gardens in the Domain of Vabbi with your jackal.
Drops for warriors from caffeinated skritt in any Crystal Desert map.
Completely train the warrior's spellbreaker elite specialization.
Earn map complete on any Crystal Desert map as a warrior.
Craft with recipes purchased in the Desolation or the Domain of Vabbi.

3625.name: Lost Lore of Crystal Oasis
3625.requirement: Collect the fragments of the book "Garden of the Gods."

bits.text: Southern shore of the Bay of Elon.
High above the Branded pyramid along a path of sand.
On the cliffs overlooking Kormir Temple.

3672.name: To Kill a God
3672.description: Journal: To Kill a God Completed

3706.name: Flowers for Jimoh
3706.description: Jimoh's family was torn when her husband Iweh spoke against Joko. She is looking for some peace in the aftermath.
3706.requirement: Help Jimoh find comfort by reaching out to her family.

3764.name: Crystal Oasis Legendary Bounties
3764.requirement: Defeat each legendary bounty in Crystal Oasis at least once.

3794.name: Nap Time
3794.requirement: Prevent damage to Yumug as he naps midway along his journey to Lommuld Kraal.

3802.name: Tip of the Spear
3802.description: <c=@Flavor>In addition to being a cultured and educated populace, the peoples of Elona are notably adept in ways of combat. </c>
3802.requirement: Recover all  Elonian weapons by completing events, looting chests, and identifying items in renown regions of the Crystal Desert.

bits.text: Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.
Earned by salvaging unidentified gear found in the Crystal Desert.

3822.name: Glorify the Golden Heart
3822.description: <c=@Flavor>Ahead of burial, a Dynastic ruler's ornate jewelry was collected, restored to glory, and placed in their ceremonial armor.</c>
3822.requirement: Collect  missing gems, and combine them with amalgamated gemstones in the Lair of Zommoros.

bits.text: This essence was brought by a water djinn to an elaborate palace in Desert Highlands.
Create with a dwarf-cut adamantine and an amalgamated gemstone in the Lair of Zommoros.
This essence was stolen by a magic-poisoned fire djinn near Oasis.
Create with a lost emerald and an amalgamated gemstone in the Lair of Zommoros.
This essence ended up in the hands of a powerful and isolated earth djinn near Elon Riverlands.
Create with an Elon sapphire and an amalgamated gemstone in the Lair of Zommoros.
Stolen by an air djinn wandering through the Desolation.
Create with a tormented tourmaline and an amalgamated gemstone in the Lair of Zommoros.
Grandmaster Elder Djinn Emine holds this somewhere in the Domain of Vabbi.
Create with a royal onyx and an amalgamated gemstone in the Lair of Zommoros.

3885.name: Desolation Insight: Silent Isle
3885.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desolation.

3902.name: Path of Fire: Act 3 Mastery
3902.requirement: Complete all  Path of Fire: Act 3 achievements.

3956.name: Istan Griffon Master: Silver
3956.requirement: Complete the Istan Griffon Master Course.

3984.name: Qais Closed
3984.description: Story Instance: Eye of the Brandstorm
3984.requirement: Learn all the details of Deputy Qais's destiny, and relay that information to Captain Rahim.

4035.name: Coalescence I: Unbridled
4035.description: Your predilection for violence has attracted the attention of malevolent energy. Perhaps you can soothe its bloodlust somehow.
4035.locked_text: Defeat a raid boss. (Only available to owners of Path of Fire.)

4037.name: Statues of Limitation
4037.requirement: Complete all three statue events within 5 minutes.

4206.name: Domain of Kourna Insight: Allied Encampment
4206.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in the Domain of Kourna.

4227.name: Squish, Squish
4227.requirement: Kill all the scarabs in 30 seconds or less.

4234.name: Thing That Wouldn't Leave
4234.description: Some people can't take a hint.
4234.requirement: Overstay your welcome in the Awakened Inquest plague research lab.

4282.name: Spectral Hand of the Market
4282.requirement: Purchase and open mystery bags from Drooburt in the Labyrinthine Cliffs bazaar.

4336.name: Legend Builder
4336.description: Combine 2 Lesser Vision Crystals with 3 Vials of Blood, 6 Sapphire Orbs, and 15 Globs of Ectoplasm in the Mystic Forge to create an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal.
4336.requirement: Help Bakkin earn renown and fire the Favor of the Colossus.
4336.locked_text: Create and consume an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal to begin this journey.

bits.text: This vision crystal is imbued with ectoplasm, enabling the user to see deeper through the veil.
First, in Dredgehaunt Cliffs: Find warmth at a hearth close to Hoelbrak.
Then, in Dredgehaunt Cliffs: Seek a great cat carved in stone.
Then, in Dredgehaunt Cliffs: Deep in the mountain, steel scores deep into stone.
Then, in Dredgehaunt Cliffs: The dredge seek riches to the southeast...
Then, in Dredgehaunt Cliffs: Search high in the sky, atop a mountain of timber.
Finally, in Dredgehaunt Cliffs: Echoes end and a legend begins at Brandalf's Steading. All Bakkin needs is an Oiled Orichalcum Torch Head...

4368.name: Jahai Insight: Fang of the Dragon
4368.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Jahai Bluffs.

4421.name: Bottled No More
4421.description: Even the djinn underestimated Kralkatorrik's power.
4421.requirement: Defeat the legendary Branded djinn in Jahai Bluffs.

4442.name: (Annual) Ascent to Madness
4442.requirement: Survive Mad King Thorn's tricks in the Ascent to Madness mission. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4495.name: Chasing Tales: Direct Approach
4495.description: Mouglon never turned his back on a fight.
4495.requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a mace in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated 30 enemies with a mace in Thunderhead Peaks.

4535.name: Chasing Tales: Mirren the Manipulator
4535.requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood scepter and perform tasks to re-create Mirren's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the heroic spirit of Mirren: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mirren: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mirren: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Mirren at a heroic font.

4563.name: Chasing Tales: Rallying Cry
4563.description: "This next one is called 'We're Comrades, Not Friends, Don't Talk to Me After This Is Over,' and it goes a little something like this..."
4563.requirement: Gain 30 boons while wielding a warhorn in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Gained 30 boons while wielding a warhorn in Thunderhead Peaks.

4628.name: Warclaw Helmet
4628.requirement: Unlock the warclaw helmet by completing the Warclaw Reward Track.

bits.text: Gorrik could have picked this one up himself.

4695.name: Skyscale of Death
4695.requirement: Infuse your skyscale egg with death.

bits.text: Speak with Sister Lissa at the Necropolis in the Domain of Vabbi.
Visit the dead at Exile's Rest in Elon Riverlands.
Visit the dead at the Bone Palace in the Desolation.
Visit the dead at the Tomb of Primeval Kings in Desert Highlands.
Visit the dead at Champion's Dawn in the Domain of Istan.

4700.name: Bleed
4700.requirement: Reforge your spears with Kralkatorrik's blood.

4701.name: Dragonfall Insight: Skyscale Eyrie
4701.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Dragonfall.

4761.name: Bonus Event: Meta-Event Rush
4761.description: Participate in meta-events around Tyria to earn bonus rewards!

4887.name: Bonus Event: Daily Champion Rush—Ascalon
4887.requirement: Defeat a champion-rank enemy in the Plains of Ashford, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, Fields of Ruin, Diessa Plateau, or Fireheart Rise.

4936.name: Picante
4936.requirement: Spend 300 Hatched Chilis at a festival vendor in Grothmar Valley.

4960.name: The Show Must Go On
4960.requirement: Finish the concert without the band being defeated.

5084.name: Daily Essence Chest Looter
5084.requirement: Loot  essence chests in Bjora Marches.

5117.name: Unwelcome Whispers
5117.requirement: Earn gold participation in 20 kodan cairn cleansing events.

5132.name: Slither-less
5132.requirement: Complete the Whisper of Jormag Strike Mission without triggering Slithering Rime explosions.

5145.name: Elemental Elegy
5145.requirement: Dispatch 10 elementals before they are freed in the Fraenir of Jormag encounter.

5238.name: Visions of the Past: You Made a Friend
5238.description: Rox has orders from Rytlock to secure assets at the devourer hatchery northwest of the town of Nolan in Diessa Plateau, currently under threat by the Molten Alliance. [This mission is now playable in Living World Season 1: Episode 1]
5238.requirement: Help Rox defend the hatchery...and find a new friend in the process.

5244.name: Special Mission: Bolster the Mines
5244.requirement: Spend  War Supplies to repair damaged structures or purchase base upgrades at the mines in Drizzlewood Coast.

5271.name: Stormcaller Armaments Collector
5271.requirement: Unlock all 16 Stormcaller weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5324.name: Special Mission: Bolster the Village
5324.requirement: Spend  War Supplies to repair damaged structures or purchase base upgrades at Leadfoot Village in Drizzlewood Coast.

5350.name: Significant Otter
5350.requirement: Obtain and use Memories of Otter from powerful enemies in the Drizzlewood Coast or by salvaging Charged Stormcaller weapons.

5405.name: Arena of the Wolverine: Gold
5405.requirement: Complete the Arena of the Wolverine adventure with a gold ranking.

5422.name: Special Mission: Cleanse the Corruption
5422.requirement: Destroy  corrupted shards in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.
5422.locked_text: Unlock by using Corrupted Intel Documents.

5455.name: Top-Tiered Terror Toppler
5455.description: Topple the top-tier terrors tormenting Tyria!
5455.requirement: Complete five unique challenge mode raid encounters.

bits.text: Bastion of the Penitent—Cairn the Indomitable
Hall of Chains—The Voice in the Void
The Key of Ahdashim—Qadim the Peerless

5514.name: Daily Ebon Vanguard Special
5514.requirement: Complete  event in Fields of Ruin.

5551.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Twenty-Five
5551.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Five.

5580.name: Killer Waves
5580.requirement: Defeat the Destroyer of the Third Fortress without getting hit by the flame shock waves while the Final Boss challenge is active.

5604.name: Lunar Homecoming: Caledon Forest
5604.requirement: Complete events in Caledon Forest in the Maguuma Jungle.

5762.name: Return to Fallen Hopes
5762.requirement: Complete the mission Fallen Hopes in Living World Season 2 Episode 1.

5824.name: Woodland Management: Siren's Landing
5824.requirement: Log wood  times in Siren's Landing.

5862.name: Treasure Hunter: Domain of Istan
5862.requirement: Open  hidden stashes within the Domain of Istan.

5864.name: Return to Legacy
5864.requirement: Complete the story mission Legacy in Living World Season 4 Episode 4.

5865.name: Ore Miner: Domain of Istan
5865.requirement: Mine ore  times in the Domain of Istan.

5867.name: Local Response: Sandswept Isles
5867.requirement: Complete  events in the Sandswept Isles.

5892.name: Second Response: Gendarran Fields
5892.requirement: Complete the Gendarran Fields Dragon Response Mission.

5893.name: Ore Miner: Jahai Bluffs
5893.requirement: Mine ore  times in Jahai Bluffs.

5977.name: Return to Eye of the Brandstorm
5977.requirement: Complete the story mission Eye of the Brandstorm in Living World Season 4 Episode 1.

6055.name: League Slayer—3v3 Season Five
6055.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 3v3 Season Five.

6104.name: Seitung Province Insight: Crystal Cave
6104.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Seitung Province.

6139.name: Can't Trust a Pirate
6139.description: Journal: Can't Trust a Pirate Completed

6171.name: True Ending
6171.description: When historians talk of this moment, they will say that you were there for it all.
6171.requirement: Participate in "Defeat Soo-Won" in Dragon's End before beginning "The Only One."

6206.name: Daily Echovald Wilds Void Slayer
6206.requirement: Kill 25 Void creatures in the Echovald Wilds.

6320.name: Respects Paid
6320.requirement: Kneel at every shrine in Dragon's End.

6372.name: Lutgardis Maestro
6372.requirement: Play all melodies at the Lutgardis Conservatory.

6408.name: Turtle Unlock: Starting Small
6408.requirement: Collect turtle food to help your little friend grow.

6526.name: Gaze into the Void
6526.requirement: In the Xunlai Jade Junkyard Strike Mission with challenge mode active, defeat Ankka while she has 6 or more stacks of Power of the Void.

6618.name: Completing Events III
6618.requirement:
Participate in  event in the Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, or the Harathi Hinterlands.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events in progress are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

6655.name: League Slayer—2v2 Season Seven
6655.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 2v2 Season Seven.

6733.name: Training Skills
6733.requirement:
Spend hero points to train a skill.

<c=@reminder>Skills can be learned in the Training tab of the Hero panel by spending hero points. </c>

6784.name: Battle for Lion's Arch Mastery
6784.requirement: Complete  Battle for Lion's Arch achievements.

6956.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Thirty-Eight
6956.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Eight.

7049.name: Scales of Dragrimmar
7049.requirement: Learn more about the Bastion of Balance and the dwarves to acquire a powerful and ancient weapon.

bits.text: Assist in Closing a Tentacle Rift in the Bastion of Balance
Complete the Aid the Bastion of Balance Achievement
Purchase an Essence of Balance from the Faction Provisioner at the Bastion of Balance
Purchase a Dwarven Relic from Arcanist Vance at the Granite Citadel after Assisting in His Research
Help Mabon balance Lyhr in Skywatch Archipelago

7061.name: Mount Maelstrom Incursions
7061.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Mount Maelstrom.

7108.name: Lake Doric Incursions
7108.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Lake Doric.

7139.name: Shattered Weapon Collector
7139.requirement: Unlock all  Shattered weapon skins by defeating champions and looting chests in the Horn of Maguuma or purchasing them from the trading post and binding them to you.

7178.name: Fractal Push
7178.requirement: Help push toward the fractal of Droknar's Light.

7207.name: Zojja's Journal: Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03
7207.requirement: Collect all of Zojja's journal pages in the Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03 fractal.
7207.locked_text: Unlock by starting the Zojja's Journal collection.

bits.text: Help the Kestrels in Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03.
Page Location: Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03, at the western end of a bridge.
Page Location: Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03, at the camp overlooking the desert.
Page Location: Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03, in a village aquatic creatures call home.

7278.name: Dungeon Delver: Crucible of Eternity
7278.requirement: Complete any path of the Crucible of Eternity dungeon.

7668.name: Convergence Conqueror
7668.description: Vigorously protecting Tyria from the evil within.

7721.name: Inner Nayos Mastery I
7721.description: Perhaps there is still a chance for this world. Is it worth saving?
7721.requirement: Complete achievements throughout Heitor's territory in Inner Nayos.

7824.name: An Object in Motion
7824.description: Where I am going is right where I am.
7824.requirement: On a flying mount, spend 30 continuous seconds being carried by the ley-line loop above the high rocks in Nyedra Surrounds.

7928.name: Ultimate Illusionist
7928.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a mesmer.

7937.name: Ooze Farmer, Under 3
7937.requirement: Defeat an ooze of any color in the World 3 Test Zone.

7973.name: Missing Brood
7973.description: It's a gentle gathering of Kryptis broodlings. They might be needy, but they're nice.
7973.requirement: Find Kosmas's missing broodlings hiding around the Horn of Maguuma.
7973.locked_text: Complete the Secrets of the Obscure story chapter Sovereign of Nayos.

bits.text: 1. Speak with Kosmas near the Forward Bivouac Waypoint.
2. "Close to coliseum, near house! Part collapsed, trapped under rocks!"
4. "Near north extractor, saw creek. Rockslide. Trapped!
6. "Pulled through rift, far away. Sand, fire...windmill! On floating rock!"
8. "Through rift, again far away. Big leaves. Scary monsters—sharp, sharp teeth!"
10. "Not Nayos! Big tower; wizardy creatures. Saw small, fuzzy beasts. Broodling played with!"
12. "Far away. High, high above ground. Grassy. Hard to see—obscure! Ate 'barries,' looked sick!"
14. "Fell into rift—lots of nature, then POOF! Grew springy legs! Furry ears? Seemed confused. Ward saw from above plant house by small tower. Ask ward!
3. Find the Kryptis with explosives in the Isolated Grasslands, and use them to free Petros.
5. Find the Kryptis with explosives in the Isolated Grasslands, and use them to free Syphus.
7. Find Lali's missing toy near a sand "waterfall" and bring it to her.
9. Defeat a saurian and bring its tooth to Cadmus.
11. Find a toy for the cats in the Wizard's Tower and return to Nemea.
13. Find the correct plant at the Bastion of the Natural, and return to help cure Chloris's stomachache.
15. After speaking to the ward member, find the broodling in a forested area at the Bastion of the Natural and remind them who they are.

8025.name: Ruins of Surmia Veteran
8025.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8032.name: Eredon Terrace Veteran
8032.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8082.name: A Rift in Our Relationship
8082.description: These Kryptis attacks are downright rude, honestly.
8082.requirement: Defeat  Kryptis attacking through rifts while fighting Charybda or Eparch.

8103.name: Chromatic Assassin Weapon Collection
8103.requirement: Unlock all  Chromatic Assassin weapon skins in your wardrobe.

8184.name: Workplace Safety
8184.requirement: Get downed by the unprotected saw blade in Harvest Den.

8227.name: Our Defenses Will Hold
8227.requirement: Successfully defend the base at Forager's Hunt with all three barriers still intact.

8245.name: Hive Hopper
8245.requirement: Complete the Queen's Confidence jumping puzzle.

8277.name: Janthir Syntri Insight: Maw's Stone
8277.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Janthir Syntri.

8299.name: Close Call
8299.requirement: Rescue the kodan sacrifice without having to resurrect them.

8301.name: Moon Camp Covert Salmon Run: Gold
8301.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Moon Camp Covert Salmon Run.

8305.name: Strange Feelings
8305.requirement: Hear Caithe and Malice's thoughts in the aftermath of the encounter.

8317.name: Loremaster's Library
8317.requirement: Read from Wry Lichen's personal library in his home in Harvest Den.

bits.text: The Ravaging of the Jade Runner

8361.name: Rehearsal
8361.requirement: Play an instrument in the lowlanders' rehearsal room.

8372.name: Janthir Syntri Rift Hunting
8372.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Janthir Syntri.

8386.name: Road of Victory VII
8386.requirement: Earn Proofs of Glory through high placement in monthly tournaments.

8579.name: Hazardous Research: Silver
8579.requirement: Earn a silver medal in the Hazardous Research adventure.

8580.name: Legendary Stormsinger's Court
8580.requirement: Defeat Decima while the challenge mote is active.

8590.name: Mistburned Barrens Insight: Hidden Sacrarium
8590.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Mistburned Barrens.

8599.name: Scavenged Obsidian Weapon Collector
8599.requirement: Unlock all  Scavenged Obsidian weapon skins from Janthir Wilds or by purchasing them from the Trading Post and binding them to you.

8646.name: (Daily) Future Fashionable
8646.requirement: Participate in fashion shows in Lion's Arch as a contestant or audience voter.

8675.name: Local Response: Dragon's End
8675.requirement: Complete  events in Dragon's End. Defeating an ambushing oni rewards extra progress.

8680.name: Local Response: Seitung Province
8680.requirement: Complete  events in Seitung Province. Defeating an ambushing oni rewards extra progress.

8681.name: Revenge of the Jade Behemoth
8681.requirement: During the Kaineng Blackout meta-event in New Kaineng City, defeat the legendary corrupted jade behemoth.

8691.name: Returning to Cantha
8691.requirement: Meet with Detective Rama in Arborstone to learn about the Return to End of Dragons event.

8695.name: Adventurous Spirit: Siege Turtles
8695.requirement: Complete any siege turtle adventure in Cantha.

8796.name: Revenge of Eparch
8796.requirement: During the Into the Spider's Lair meta-event in Inner Nayos, defeat Eparch, the Consumed King.
